txt.en: The Orcs patrolling the Whitshaws seem very organized. One can only assume that their leader is somewhere nearby, preparing an invasion in Núrzum's wake.
You have defeated the White Hand Siege-leader in the Whitshaws, but as long as Núrzum roams unhindered, the enemy is a greater threat than the people of Wildermore can withstand.
The Orcs patrolling the Whitshaws seem very organized. One can only assume that their leader is somewhere nearby, preparing an invasion in Núrzum's wake.
Find and defeat a White Hand Siege-leader

An Orc Siege-leader can likely be found in the woods of the northern Whitshaws where the Orc patrols are the thickest.\n\nYou should defeat the leader of the patrolling White Hand sentries in the Whitshaws.

An Orc Siege-leader can likely be found in the woods of the northern Whitshaws where the Orc-patrols are the thickest.\n\nYou should defeat the captain of the patrolling White Hand sentries in the Whitshaws.
You have defeated the White Hand Siege-leader in the Whitshaws, but as long as Núrzum roams unhindered, the enemy is a greater threat than the people of Wildermore can withstand.
